tool_description: Automatically categorizes support tickets based on content analysis to enable proper routing and handling.
error_messages: Ticket not found: The provided ticket_id does not exist.
Classification failed: Unable to determine category with sufficient confidence. Manual review required.
Invalid confidence threshold: Value must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
Empty content: Subject and description cannot be empty for classification.
usage: Provide ticket_id, subject, and description to automatically classify the ticket into appropriate categories for routing and handling.

primary_category.description: Main category (billing, technical, product, shipping, account)

suggested_tags.description: Additional relevant tags for the ticket
